summary.span: 为 和 对象提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for both and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含通用的文件和目录操作的方法。The class contains methods that are common to file and directory manipulation. 一个对象可以表示一个文件或目录，因此用作的基础或对象。A object can represent either a file or a directory, thus serving as the basis for or objects. 分析文件和目录的很多时，请使用此基类的类。Use this base class when parsing a lot of files and directories. 在派生的类可以继承仅当在派生的类具有从 AllAccess 权限枚举。A derived class can inherit from only if the derived class has the AllAccess permission from the enumeration. 在接受一个路径的成员，路径可以引用的文件或只是一个目录。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路径也可以指相对路径或服务器和共享名称的通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，以下所有条件都可接受的路径：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - "MyDir\\\MySubdir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare"在 C# 中，或"\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问所有文件和目录，查询的每个条目的一些信息。The following example shows how to loop through all the files and directories, querying some information about each entry. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件或目录的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes for the current file or directory.
of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 值可以是缓存时可以为值本身或其他属性进行访问。The value may be cached when either the value itself or other properties are accessed. 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果该路径不存在从最后一个缓存状态开始，返回值是`(FileAttributes)(-1)`。If the path doesn't exist as of the last cached state, the return value is `(FileAttributes)(-1)`. 或仅可设置值时引发。 or can only be thrown when setting the value. 此属性的值是压缩的存档、 目录、 隐藏、 脱机、 只读的系统和临时文件的属性标志的组合。The value of this property is a combination of the archive, compressed, directory, hidden, offline, read-only, system, and temporary file attribute flags. 当设置此值时，使用按位 OR 运算符 (`|` C# 中或`Or`在 Visual Basic 中) 要应用多个值。When you set this value, use the bitwise OR operator (`|` in C# or `Or` in Visual Basic) to apply more than one value. 若要保留中的任何现有值属性，包含的值在分配中的属性。To retain any existing values in the property, include the value of the property in your assignment. 例如:For example: `exampleFile.Attributes = exampleFile.Attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly;` ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime CreationTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.CreationTime : DateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前文件或目录的创建时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the creation time of the current file or directory.

value.span: 当前 对象的创建日期和时间。

span.span: The creation date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果该文件中所述对象不存在，此属性将返回到公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 点If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)，调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 不支持创建或出生时间的 Unix 平台，将此属性返回更早版本的最后一个状态更改的时间和上次修改时间。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 其他平台，它将返回午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)，调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式的驱动器可以缓存文件元数据信息，例如短时间内的文件创建时间。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 此过程称为文件隧道。This process is known as file tunneling. 因此，可能需要显式设置文件的创建时间，如果要覆盖或替换现有文件。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/cpp/program.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[FileSystemInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FileSystemInfo/VB/FileSystemInfo.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果该文件中所述对象不存在，此属性将返回到公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 点If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 不支持创建或出生时间的 Unix 平台，将此属性返回更早版本的最后一个状态更改的时间和上次修改时间。On Unix platforms that do not support creation or birth time, this property returns the older of the time of the last status change and the time of the last modification. 其他平台，它将返回午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日On other platforms, it returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)，调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. NTFS 格式的驱动器可以缓存文件元数据信息，例如短时间内的文件创建时间。NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time. 此过程称为文件隧道。This process is known as file tunneling. 因此，可能需要显式设置文件的创建时间，如果要覆盖或替换现有文件。As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Extension`属性返回扩展，包括句点 （.）。The `Extension` property returns the extension, including the period (.). 例如，对于文件 c:\NewFile.txt，此属性返回".txt"。For example, for a file c:\NewFile.txt, this property returns ".txt". 下表列出了其他典型或相关的 I/O 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要执行此操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入一个文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |从文本文件中读取。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |检索文件的完全限定的路径。Retrieve the fully qualified path of a file.|| |只检索文件名的路径。Retrieve only the file name a path.|| |检索路径中仅目录名称。Retrieve only the directory name from a path.|| |更改文件扩展名。Change the extension of a file.||

Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的更新通过"触摸"操作的属性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此示例中，该文件"访问"，更新，和属性设置为当前日期和时间。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. span.span: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the current file or directory was last accessed.

value.span: 上次访问当前文件或目录的 UTC 时间。

span.span: The UTC time that the current file or directory was last accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果该文件中所述对象不存在，此属性将返回到公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00 点If the file described in the object does not exist, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

exception.span: 不能初始化数据。

span.span: cannot initialize the data.

exception.span: 当前操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

span.span: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.

exception.span: 调用方试图设置无效的访问时间。

span.span: The caller attempts to set an invalid access time.

permission.span: 用于设置上次访问时间。

span.span: for setting the last access time.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime LastWriteTime { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.LastWriteTime : DateTime with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置上次写入当前文件或目录的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time when the current file or directory was last written to.

value.span: 上次写入当前文件的时间。

span.span: The time the current file was last written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果文件或目录中所述对象不存在，或如果包含此文件或目录的文件系统不支持此信息，此属性返回午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日If the file or directory described in the object does not exist, or if the file system that contains this file or directory does not support this information, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)，调整为本地时间。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了的更新通过"触摸"操作的属性。The following code example demonstrates the updating of the property through a "touch" operation. 在此示例中，该文件"访问"，更新，和属性设置为当前日期和时间。In this example, the file is "touched", updating the , and properties to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/cs/touch.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.FileSystemInfo_touch/vb/touch.vb#00)]

summary.span: 获取或设置上次写入当前文件或目录的时间，其格式为协调世界时 (UTC)。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), when the current file or directory was last written to.

value.span: 上次写入当前文件的 UTC 时间。

span.span: The UTC time when the current file was last written to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。This method may return an inaccurate value because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system. 值属性会预先缓存，如果当前实例对象返回从以下任一方法：The value of the property is pre-cached if the current instance of the object was returned from any of the following methods: - - - - - - 若要获取最新值，请调用方法。To get the latest value, call the method. 如果文件或目录中所述对象不存在，或如果包含此文件或目录的文件系统不支持此信息，此属性返回午夜 12:00，公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日If the file or directory described in the object does not exist, or if the file system that contains this file or directory does not support this information, this property returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 对于文件，获取该文件的名称。

span.span: For files, gets the name of the file.

summary.span: 对于目录，如果存在层次结构，则获取层次结构中最后一个目录的名称。

span.span: For directories, gets the name of the last directory in the hierarchy if a hierarchy exists.

summary.span: 否则， 属性获取该目录的名称。

span.span: Otherwise, the property gets the name of the directory.

value.span: 一个字符串，它是父目录的名称、层次结构中最后一个目录的名称或文件的名称（包括文件扩展名）。

span.span: A string that is the name of the parent directory, the name of the last directory in the hierarchy, or the name of a file, including the file name extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于目录，`Name`返回父目录，如 Dir，不 c:\Dir 名称。For a directory, `Name` returns only the name of the parent directory, such as Dir, not c:\Dir. 子目录，`Name`返回仅子目录，例如 Sub1，不 c:\Dir\Sub1 的名称。For a subdirectory, `Name` returns only the name of the subdirectory, such as Sub1, not c:\Dir\Sub1. 对于文件，`Name`返回文件名和文件扩展名，如 MyFile.txt，不 c:\Dir\Myfile.txt。For a file, `Name` returns only the file name and file name extension, such as MyFile.txt, not c:\Dir\Myfile.txt.

summary.span: 最初由用户指定的目录（不论是相对目录还是绝对目录）。

span.span: The path originally specified by the user, whether relative or absolute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新对象的状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileSystemInfo.Refresh` 获取当前文件系统中的文件的快照。`FileSystemInfo.Refresh` takes a snapshot of the file from the current file system. `Refresh` 不能更正基础文件系统，即使文件系统返回不正确或过时的信息。`Refresh` cannot correct the underlying file system even if the file system returns incorrect or outdated information. 这可以在如 Windows 98 平台上。This can happen on platforms such as Windows 98. 必须对调用`Refresh`之前尝试获取属性信息或信息可能已过期。Calls must be made to `Refresh` before attempting to get the attribute information, or the information will be outdated.

exception.span: 设备（如磁盘驱动器）未准备好。

span.span: A device such as a disk drive is not ready.
